n = int(input())
move_count = 0
while n > 1:
    if n % 2 == 0:
        n //= 2
    else:
        n -= 1
    move_count += 1
print(move_count)

import sys
import math

N = int(input())

moves = 0

for i in range(1,N+1):
    if(i*i >= N):
        moves = i
        break

print(2*moves-2)

N = int(input())

moves = 0

for i in range(1,N+1):

n = int(input())
move_count = 0
while n > 1:
    n = n // 2 if n % 2 == 0 else n - 1
    move_count += 1
print(move_count)
